description.displayText: It is with pleasure that I recommend Ms. M for a position of caregiver. M was the one caregiver who dedicated her time and effort into making sure my dad was safe and cared for. Every other caregiver’s stay was short lived, but she stayed till my dad was no more. She went all out. Her work ethic is just priceless. Have her as your caregiver and build a lifetime relationship. Thank you M. You made an impact in our family.
